ontology_schema.label: Legal Case
ontology_schema.description: The root node for all legal cases.

ontology_schema.label: Criminal Case
ontology_schema.description: Cases involving criminal offenses.

ontology_schema.label: Violent Offense
ontology_schema.description: Crimes involving physical violence or threat of violence against a person.

ontology_schema.label: Homicide
ontology_schema.description: Offenses resulting in the death of a person.

ontology_schema.label: Murder
ontology_schema.description: Offense of murder as defined by the Indian Penal Code.

ontology_schema.label: Sexual Offense
ontology_schema.description: Crimes of a sexual nature.

ontology_schema.label: Rape
ontology_schema.description: Offense of rape as defined by the Indian Penal Code.

ontology_schema.label: Gang Rape
ontology_schema.description: Offense of gang rape as defined by the Indian Penal Code.

ontology_schema.label: POCSO Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses under the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act.

ontology_schema.label: Sexual Harassment
ontology_schema.description: Offense of sexual harassment as defined by the Indian Penal Code.

ontology_schema.label: Assault
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving physical assault not necessarily resulting in death.

ontology_schema.label: Voluntarily Causing Hurt
ontology_schema.description: Offense of voluntarily causing simple hurt.

ontology_schema.label: Voluntarily Causing Hurt by Dangerous Weapon
ontology_schema.description: Offense of voluntarily causing hurt by means of a dangerous weapon or means.

ontology_schema.label: Attempt to Murder
ontology_schema.description: Offense of attempting to commit murder.

ontology_schema.label: Property Offense
ontology_schema.description: Crimes committed against property, such as theft, robbery, and trespass.

ontology_schema.label: Theft
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving theft without immediate violence.

ontology_schema.label: Theft in Dwelling House
ontology_schema.description: Offense of theft committed in any building, tent, or vessel used as a human dwelling.

ontology_schema.label: Robbery
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving theft with violence or threat of violence (less than 5 perpetrators).

ontology_schema.label: Robbery
ontology_schema.description: Offense of committing robbery.

ontology_schema.label: Voluntarily Causing Hurt in Robbery
ontology_schema.description: Offense of voluntarily causing hurt while committing or attempting to commit robbery.

ontology_schema.label: Robbery with Deadly Weapon
ontology_schema.description: Offense of robbery or dacoity, with an attempt to cause death or grievous hurt, using a deadly weapon.

ontology_schema.label: Dacoity
ontology_schema.description: Robbery committed by five or more persons.

ontology_schema.label: Dacoity
ontology_schema.description: Offense of committing dacoity (robbery by 5 or more persons).

ontology_schema.label: Trespass
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving unlawful entry into property.

ontology_schema.label: House-trespass with Preparation
ontology_schema.description: Offense of house-trespass after preparation for causing hurt, assault, or wrongful restraint.

ontology_schema.label: Lurking House-trespass
ontology_schema.description: Offense of lurking house-trespass or house-breaking by night to commit an offense punishable with imprisonment.

ontology_schema.label: Extortion
ontology_schema.description: Offense of extortion by putting a person in fear of injury.

ontology_schema.label: Preparatory Offense
ontology_schema.description: Crimes involving preparation or assembly to commit a more serious offense.

ontology_schema.label: Preparation for Dacoity
ontology_schema.description: Offense of making any preparation for committing dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Assembling for Dacoity
ontology_schema.description: Offense of assembling for the purpose of committing dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Other Offense
ontology_schema.description: Miscellaneous offenses, including against public justice or other statutes.

ontology_schema.label: Disappearance of Evidence
ontology_schema.description: Offense of causing disappearance of evidence of an offense, or giving false information.

ontology_schema.label: Criminal Intimidation
ontology_schema.description: Offense of criminal intimidation.

ontology_schema.label: Arms Act Violation
ontology_schema.description: Violation of the Arms Act, 1959, such as possession of arms without a license or in contravention of a notification.

ontology_schema.label: Rioting
ontology_schema.description: Offense of rioting, using force or violence by an unlawful assembly.

ontology_schema.label: Unlawful Assembly
ontology_schema.description: Offense where every member of an unlawful assembly is guilty of an offense committed in prosecution of a common object.

ontology_schema.label: SC/ST Act Violation
ontology_schema.description: Offenses under the Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Act, 1989.

ontology_schema.label: IT Act Violation
ontology_schema.description: Offenses under the Information Technology Act, 2000, such as computer-related offenses.

ontology_schema.label: Terrorism Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses related to terrorism, such as under POTA or UAPA.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the deceased victim(s).

cause_of_death.description: The medical or direct cause of death (e.g., strangulation, stabbing, gunshot).

weapon_used.description: Weapon used to commit the murder.

motive.description: The alleged motive for the offense (e.g., property dispute, personal enmity, sudden fight, communal hatred, lust for property).

time_of_offense.description: The approximate date and time of the murder.

number_of_perpetrators.description: The number of individuals involved in committing the murder.

postmortem_report_findings.description: Key findings from the postmortem examination, such as number and nature of injuries.

victim_age.description: Age of the victim, if specified (especially if minor).

other_victims_injured.description: Names or identifiers of other victims injured during the same incident.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim.

victim_age.description: The age of the victim at the time of the offense.

act_description.description: Description of the alleged act of rape (e.g., 'forcible vaginal penetrative sex').

medical_evidence_findings.description: Summary of medical evidence (e.g., injuries, hymen status, 'redness over labia minora').

use_of_force.description: Whether physical force or violence was used during the commission.

location_of_offense.description: The place where the offense occurred (e.g., 'victim's home', 'accused's house', 'rooftop').

accused_relationship_to_victim.description: Relationship of the accused to the victim (e.g., 'Father', 'Neighbour', 'Guardian', 'Friend's father').

forensic_evidence.description: Summary of forensic evidence (e.g., 'DNA match of semen on victim's clothes').

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim(s).

act_description.description: Description of the alleged act of gang rape.

number_of_perpetrators.description: Number of persons involved in the act.

location_of_offense.description: The place where the offense occurred (e.g., 'Hotel', 'House').

victim_age.description: The age of the victim at the time of the offense.

medical_evidence_findings.description: Summary of medical or forensic evidence.

use_of_drugs_on_victim.description: Whether the victim was drugged or intoxicated.

motive.description: The alleged motive for the offense (e.g., 'communal hatred', 'extortion').

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the child victim.

victim_age.description: The age of the victim (must be < 18).

act_description.description: Description of the sexual act (e.g., 'penetrative sexual assault').

medical_evidence_findings.description: Summary of medical or forensic evidence (e.g., 'redness over labia minora').

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim.

act_description.description: Description of the act of sexual harassment (e.g., physical contact, remarks, demand).

location_of_offense.description: The place where the offense occurred (e.g., 'victim's house').

verbal_remarks_made.description: Specific sexually coloured remarks, if any.

physical_contact_description.description: Nature of the unwelcome physical contact (e.g., 'caught hold of hand').

time_of_offense.description: The approximate date and time of the offense (e.g., '2:30 a.m.').

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim.

injury_description.description: Description of the hurt or injury caused (e.g., bruises, swelling).

weapon_used.description: Weapon or means used to cause hurt (e.g., 'hands', 'fists', 'stick').

ipc_324.label: Voluntarily Causing Hurt by Dangerous Weapon

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim.

motive.description: The alleged motive for the offense.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim.

act_description.description: The act constituting the attempt (e.g., 'stabbing', 'shooting', 'thrown from height').

injury_description.description: Description of injuries sustained by the victim (e.g., 'CLW on left cervical', 'multiple fractures').

motive.description: The alleged motive for the offense (e.g., 'sudden quarrel', 'suspected of disclosing affair').

location_of_dwelling.description: The address or description of the dwelling (house, tent, vessel) from which theft occurred.

stolen_property_description.description: List or description of the items stolen (e.g., jewellery, cash).

property_value.description: Estimated monetary value of the stolen property.

method_of_entry.description: How entry was gained to the dwelling (e.g., 'broken lock', 'open door', 'broken into').

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim(s) of the robbery.

stolen_property_description.description: List or description of the items stolen (e.g., cash, valuables, scooter).

use_of_force_description.description: Description of the force or threat of force used (e.g., 'assaulted', 'threatened', 'threw chili powder').

number_of_perpetrators.description: The number of individuals involved (must be less than 5).

property_value.description: Estimated monetary value of the stolen property (e.g., 1400000, 4080).

weapon_used.description: Any weapon used or shown during the robbery (e.g., 'firearm').

identification_method.description: Method used to identify the accused.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim(s).

injury_description.description: Description of the hurt or injury caused (e.g., 'bleeding injury', 'contused lacerated wound').

weapon_used.description: Weapon used to cause the hurt.

stolen_property_description.description: List or description of the items stolen. Can be 'attempt' if nothing was taken.

number_of_perpetrators.description: The number of individuals involved (must be less than 5).

medical_report_findings.description: Key findings from the medical examination of the victim (e.g., 'CLW on occipital').

identification_method.description: Method used to identify the accused.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim(s).

weapon_used.description: The deadly weapon used or exhibited.

action_with_weapon.description: How the weapon was used (e.g., 'used to stab', 'shown to threaten', 'gave blow').

stolen_property_description.description: List or description of the items stolen. Can be 'attempt' if nothing was taken.

injury_description.description: Description of any injury caused by the weapon.

identification_method.description: Method used to identify the accused.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim(s) of the dacoity.

stolen_property_description.description: List or description of the items stolen (e.g., jewellery, cash).

number_of_perpetrators.description: The number of individuals involved (must be 5 or more, or 4 in some cases).

weapon_used.description: Any weapon used or shown during the dacoity.

use_of_force_description.description: Description of the force or threat of force used (e.g., 'no one injured').

location_of_offense.description: The place where the dacoity occurred (e.g., 'victim's house').

property_recovered.description: Description of stolen property that was recovered.

location_of_dwelling.description: The address or description of the dwelling that was trespassed.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the person(s) inside the dwelling.

purpose_of_trespass.description: The alleged purpose of the trespass (e.g., 'to commit robbery', 'to commit assault/harassment', 'to commit dacoity').

time_of_offense.description: The approximate date and time of the trespass (e.g., '2:30 a.m.').

method_of_entry.description: How entry was gained to the dwelling.

preparation_description.description: Description of the preparation made (e.g., 'carrying weapons').

location_of_dwelling.description: The address or description of the dwelling that was trespassed.

time_of_offense.description: The time of the offense, typically 'night'.

intended_offense.description: The offense intended to be committed inside (e.g., 'theft', 'robbery', 'dacoity').

concealment_method.description: How the perpetrator concealed their presence.

stolen_property_description.description: List or description of the items stolen, if any.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim.

threat_of_injury_description.description: Description of the threat or fear of injury used (e.g., 'make video viral', 'eliminate family').

property_extorted.description: The property or valuable security extorted (e.g., 'money', 'gold ornaments').

method_of_threat.description: How the threat was communicated (e.g., 'verbal', 'showing video').

location_of_assembly.description: The place where the group was assembled (e.g., 'Zhaveri Bazar').

weapons_recovered.description: List of weapons or items recovered from the group (e.g., 'knives', 'chopper').

target_description.description: The alleged target of the intended dacoity (e.g., 'Zhaveri shop').

actions_of_preparation.description: Specific actions taken that constitute preparation.

location_of_assembly.description: The place where the group was assembled.

proof_of_purpose.description: Evidence proving the assembly was for the purpose of committing dacoity (e.g., 'informant info', 'overheard conversation').

weapons_recovered.description: List of weapons or items recovered from the group.

primary_offense_committed.description: The main offense (e.g., 'murder') for which evidence was concealed.

act_of_concealment.description: The specific action taken to make the evidence disappear (e.g., 'hiding dead body in haystack', 'hiding body in bathroom', 'attempt to use septic tank').

evidence_concealed_description.description: Description of the evidence that was concealed (e.g., 'dead body').

perpetrator_identity.description: Identifier of the person who concealed the evidence.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim who was threatened.

threat_description.description: The nature of the threat (e.g., 'threat of injury', 'threat to kill', 'make video viral').

weapon_type.description: The legal category of the weapon under the Arms Act.

license_held.description: Whether the accused held a valid license (relevant for Sec 3).

notification_under_sec_4_proven.description: Whether the prosecution proved the existence of a notification under Sec 4 for the area (relevant for 'other_weapon').

possession_circumstance.description: How and where the weapon was possessed (e.g., 'on person', 'in vehicle').

number_of_perpetrators.description: Number of persons in the assembly (>= 5).

use_of_force_or_violence.description: Whether force or violence was used by the assembly.

associated_offense.description: Other offenses committed during the riot (e.g., 'Murder', 'Gang Rape').

number_of_perpetrators.description: Number of persons in the assembly (>= 5).

common_object_of_assembly.description: The common object of the assembly (e.g., 'to commit murder').

associated_offense.description: The offense committed in prosecution of the common object.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim.

victim_sc_st_status_known_to_accused.description: Whether the accused knew the victim belonged to SC/ST.

underlying_ipc_offense.description: The associated IPC offense committed (e.g., 'Rape', 'Assault', 'Murder', 'Gang Rape').

caste_based_slurs_used.description: Whether caste-based insults or slurs were used.

victim_identity.description: Name or identifier of the victim.

act_description.description: Description of the computer-related offense (e.g., 'took videos of incident', 'threatened to make viral').

device_used.description: Device used to commit the offense (e.g., 'mobile phone', 'computer').

platform_used.description: Platform used, if any (e.g., 'social media', 'messaging app').

act_description.description: Description of the terrorist act (e.g., 'bomb blast', 'conspiracy').

number_of_incidents.description: Number of distinct incidents (e.g., multiple blasts).

target_description.description: The target of the act (e.g., 'public transport', 'government building').
